Control Name: 1.2.4 There is a monthly or yearly meeting where the budget is reviewed.
Control Statement: As Azure changes and new services are introduced, it is recommended that key services are revisited to see if any new services offered in Azure can help drive down cost or if new SKUs can help drive down cost. It's recommended that this is done 1-4 times a year. Revisit key Azure services to see if there were any updates which could reduce spending.
